subject: order inquiry
description_text:
Hello, I ordered a set of pro x ultra pedals along with 2 vam pro motors.

Amazon delivered the pedals and also said the motors were delivered but
they in fact were not. they advised me to wait until Dec 10th and reach out
again if they still aren't here.


I was wondering if they were sent separately and if I could get a tracking
number for that order. I have attached my order details below.
[image: Screenshot 2025-11-15 211101.png]
